channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytip of bed and mattress, 17th December
item.description:

item.title: Dead fox, 17th December

item.title: Outside 145 - 159 Crayford Way, 17th December
item.description:
The road needs sweeping in the lay by 145 - 59 Crayford. Trees have been cut back and some of the mess has been left and needs clearing up asap. Resident said the lay by has not been swept for at least 6 months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crayford Way, Barnes Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Failed light, 17th December
item.description:
Light failed creating dark spots in passageway. It is the passage which links Oakfield Gardens to Eden Park railway station subway. I started with Network Rail but they think it is a council light.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park Underpass, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen Berries on pavement o/s No 6 & No 8 which are dangerous as getting icy & slippery, 17th December
item.description:
Resident reporting o/s her property in between No 6 & No 8 there is a tree and the red berries are fallen onto the pavement and covered the pavement from the edge of the kerb and up to the driveways and it is very slippery and dangerous for all residents and pedestrians are at risk of slipping & hurt themselves. Please could the street get wept
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Exeter Road, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
